meanings.definition: The dried meat of a coconut from which oil is extracted.
meanings.sent1: The copras was used to make coconut oil.
meanings.sent2: Farmers collect copras to produce cooking oil.
meanings.sent3: The copras decided to take a vacation from being coconut oil.
meanings.sent4: The copras lay dormant, holding the essence of the coconut within.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the copras filled the air, reminding everyone of tropical beaches.

meanings.sent1: The copras provided shade on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: The copras swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The copras tree told jokes to the other plants in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The copras stood tall like a guardian of the forest.
meanings.sent5: Under the copras, children played and laughed joyfully.
